20a5d18d-7612-4bea-bbd1-35e917db5a61.description: We are on a mission to change dentistry together. We believe that there is always a better and more efficient way to provide care and dialogue around dental treatment. We also believe that none of this can be done alone, which is why we collaborate with a network of dental professionals, industry leaders and resellers. This certification reflects a partnership with 3Shape Academy in delivering amazing experiences.
20a5d18d-7612-4bea-bbd1-35e917db5a61.name: Aspen Dental TRIOS 4 Certified Trainer

alignments.name: Aspen Dental
alignments.description: Aspen Dental is committed to treating patients with the compassion and respect they deserve. One way they do this is through the use of dental technology. In recognition of outstanding achievement, the Aspen Dental TRIOS 4 Certification holder has completed all developmental aspects of TRIOS 4, patient engagement apps, and advanced workflows.

alignments.name: 3Shape Academy
alignments.description: Candidates for this program must have a sponsor, access to equipment during the entire program, and an ability to meet the parameters for training. In states with conflicting regulations, the state licensing board regulations are followed. 3Shape holds the rights to issue and revoke certifications at any time.

badge_template_activities.title: A knowledge base and skills assessment is taken by all participants in the TRIOS Train the Trainer program with a 90% passing percentage.
This candidate has attended the 3-Day Train the Trainer Certification Program.
Is an active member of the Aspen Dental organization.

alignments.name: Candid PRO
alignments.description: Everyone deserves to feel like they can confidently express themselves — but for millions of people, their teeth are in the way. By eliminating barriers to orthodontic treatment and providing the highest standard of care, we empower people to change their lives. Straighter teeth are just the start.
